asset_id.description: The ID of the uploaded asset.

name.description: The name to give the document as it will be displayed in UIs.

example.name: Animi saepe quo facilis enim eos.

name.description: The name of the package to add.

example.name: Consequatur et excepturi voluptates ut ipsa.
